sentences.english: Students according to grade placement test scores.
sentences.chinese: 根據學生的考試成績分班分級。

sentences.english: Dream dream, I listened wanting the class in cent right away.
sentences.chinese: 夢夢，我聽說馬上要分班了。

sentences.english: Self-contained classes and departmentalized classes, with a separate teacher for each discipline, fall within a horizontal organization.
sentences.chinese: 水平組織採用包班制和分班制，每個學科配一名教師。

sentences.english: Liberal arts after divide into classes, three girl friends to continue by science in class five.
sentences.chinese: 文理分班後，三閨蜜繼續在五班受着理科的摧殘。

sentences.english: Man On Campus entrance examination results in accordance with the strict placement.
sentences.chinese: 文月學園是按照升學考試的成績嚴格分班。

sentences.english: By afternoon, I closed our doors started to review, the placement test is imminent.
sentences.chinese: 到了下午，我閉關房門開始複習，分班考試迫在眉睫。

sentences.english: They put all the students through the replacement examination.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓所有的學生參加分班考試。

sentences.english: Students should be assigned to small-sized classes according to age and level.
sentences.chinese: 小班制教學，依年齡和程度分班，提供。
